markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Daywalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=3549) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 58</row>

**Archetype** [Vampire](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=181)

**Prerequisites**
[Vampire Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3545)

</column>

---

Through a profane pledge or a bloodline quirk, you can tolerate the sun's light. You gain the [advanced undead benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=1695) and can't be destroyed by sunlight. This doesn't prevent you from becoming [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) by exposure to the sun.
name: Daywalker

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 6" pfs="Standard" > Daywalker Source Book of the Dead pg. 58 Archetype Vampire Prerequisites Vampire Dedication --- Through a profane pledge or a bloodline quirk, you can tolerate the sun's light. You gain the advanced undead benefits and can't be destroyed by sunlight. This doesn't prevent you from becoming slowed by exposure to the sun.
